dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S221 IS: Pregnancy Assistance Fund Expansion Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Casey introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to authorize additional funding for the pregnancy assistance fund.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Pregnancy Assistance Fund Expansion Act.

section.header: Additional funding for the Pregnancy Assistance Fund
section.text: Section 10214 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (42 U.S.C. 18204) is amended by adding at the end the following: In addition to amounts authorized to be appropriated in the previous sentence, there are authorized to be appropriated to carry out section 10210, an additional $25,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2016 through 2019..
